import React from 'react' import TestimonialApi from './TestimonialApi' function Slide({id,image,design,name,offcer,post,date,desc,valueIndex,index}) { let position = "nextSlide" if(valueIndex === index){ position = "activeSlide" } if(valueIndex === index -1 || index === 0 && valueIndex === TestimonialApi.length) return ( <>
{design}

{name}

{post}

{date}

{desc}

) } export default Slide
